question: For each item on this list, tell me if you think it is happening a lot more, somewhat more, only a little more or not more these days than five years ago: communication and travel between the people of your country and people in other countries.
raw_output:
I believe communication and travel between people of my country and those in other countries have increased somewhat more over the past five years. Technological advancements, easier access to digital communication platforms, and decreased travel restrictions have likely contributed to more international interaction, but not to the extent of a dramatic surge. Therefore, I think they have become somewhat more common, but not significantly so. 

ANSWER: B
